name: BingBoji
description:
Welcome to BingBoji, an action-packed arcade-style game where you play as the heroic BingBoji on a mission to save a cursed village from the grip of an evil spirit. The village is under siege, with all its inhabitants held captive, and it's up to you to defeat the evil spirit and lift the curse.

As you journey through the village, you'll face a variety of challenges in the form of arcade-style puzzles that will test your skills and reflexes. 

But the ultimate test awaits you at the end of the game, as you come face-to-face with the evil spirit in a thrilling boss battle. Will you be able to defeat the spirit and save the village, or will darkness reign forever?

Get ready to embark on an exciting adventure in BingBoji, the ultimate arcade-style action game!

Note: Some error may pop up, in that case, just reload the game. No not TheGame I mean reload BingBoji.

Controls:

  • 'Home Scene': Use WASD to move, E to interact
  • 'Portal Scene': Use AD to move, space to jump, E to interact, V to dash
  • 'Days' Level': Use WASD to move
  • 'Nacho's Level': Use W to thrust, AD to rotate, space/left mouse button to shoot
  • 'GwnTim's Level': Use AD to move, W to climb ladder, space to jump
  • 'Deadtime's Level': Use left mouse button to move puzzles
  • 'Rhyme's Level': Use AD to move
  • 'Boss Battle Level': Use AD to move, space to release ball
